name: Overwork (luE2)
description:
Hey, do you think everything in life is too simple? Do you feel like your life is stress-free? Come and get some hypertension experience! Here, you will experience the pressure of mortgage, workplace PUA, and the harm of overtime to your health! Accept the ravages of your work!

Try to use your WASD or ↑↓←→ to finish your work!
